Today in Pembrokeshire, surf is looking solid at 4 ft @ 11s WSW with a moderate 13 mph SSW wind. Good spots like Abereiddy and Whitesands Bay are working well, especially on the mid-tide push. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 10 ft @ 11s WSW but with fresh 21 mph WSW winds, making it blown out across the board. On the day after, the swell eases to 5 ft @ 8s SW but with strong 25 mph S winds, keeping it poor. Best: today.
